channel.title: Class suggestion: The killer king
channel.description:
**Passive:** immune to death at night
**Night ability**: disguise killer, killing one player while pretending to follow another (infinite). **Night ability:** Kill a player, while sending guards to another player.(4 uses)
**Day ability:** The same as the starting king
**Idea:** Every natural killer will become a killer king if they are voted as king. A killer king will be the starting king 1/16 of the games, as any other players.
